query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notification_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  member_id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  task_assigned BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  task_completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  task_overdue BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  edit_proposal BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  dependency_proposal BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  project_invitation BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  shopping_reminder BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  milestone_reached BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  rotation_reminder BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_member (member_id)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2YxFwjaS6n4EGE7.031ea3147ddd --database 5dPSLyh58e9tDjPvGLCuzX --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notification_settings (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  member_id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  task_assigned BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  task_completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  task_overdue BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  edit_proposal BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  dependency_proposal BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  project_invitation BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  shopping_reminder BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  milestone_reached BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  rotation_reminder BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_member (member_id)
)
